title: raamabhiraama ragurAma
sahitya:
rAmAbhirAma raghurAma O rAma

anupallavi

 tamasamu lEla sItA manOramaNa

caraNam 1

 pagajEyuTella nApAla nIdu vagalEla viDjAlavu gajEndrapAla
   
caraNam 2

 nI sommu nEnaDuga lEdu niNDu mOsamau prapancamandAsa lEdu
   
caraNam 3

 Asa nIyeDa tanaku bOdu nija dAsa rakSaka ninu vinA gati lEdu
   
caraNam 4

 nI sari samAna mevarilalO rAma nIraja daLAkSa cikkitIra nIvalalO
   
caraNam 5

kalla lADani teliyalErO nI valla nEramugAni nE nIku vEra
   
caraNam 6

 shrIpati nanu maruva taguna idi pApamE gAni eDabAya mana saguNa
   
caraNam 7

 AjAnubAhu karamIra shrI tyAgarAjuni bhavAbdhi dATinci para mIrA
